verbs.description: [ARG1: social media site] [V: used] [ARG0: by pittsburgh mass shooting suspect] says it is n’t going anywhere the social media website used by pittsburgh mass shooting suspect robert bowers 46 says it is n’t going anywhere gab com is a social media site popular with users banned by more mainstream social media such as twitter white nationalist neo - nazis and other extremists have been known to use the site bowers posted on gab prior to saturday shooting that killed 11 people at a synagogue in squirrel hill among his final posts were hias hias squirrel hill social media pittsburgh twitter paypal gab ceo hebrew immigrant aid society robert bowers hearst television andrew torba
